thread.title: Premier League 2023-24, West Ham stun Arsenal 2-0: Key stats
thread.title_full: Premier League 2023-24, West Ham stun Arsenal 2-0: Key stats

author: Rajdeep Saha
title: Premier League 2023-24, West Ham stun Arsenal 2-0: Key stats
text: Premier League 2023-24, West Ham stun Arsenal 2-0: Key stats [Rajdeep Saha](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/author/rajdeep/147) [West Ham United](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/sports/west-ham-united) picked up another massive win against a big side in the Premier League 2023-24 season. After downing Manchester United 2-0 on matchday 18, West Ham stunned [Arsenal](https://www.newsbytesapp.com/news/sports/arsenal-fc) 2-0 at the Emirates. With this result, the Hammers have now claimed three successive league victories, keeping a clean sheet in each of these matches West Ham are flying at the moment. Here's more. West Ham are the in-form side in the Premier League Since a 3-2 defeat against Brentford on November 4, West Ham have claimed six wins from eight matches (D1 L1). David Moyes's men drew 1-1 versus Crystal Palace and suffered a 5-0 defeat against Fulham in this period. West Ham have beaten Nottingham Forest, Burnley, Tottenham Hotspur, Wolves, Manchester United, and Arsenal. West Ham picked up their 10th league win and are sixth.
